overview: Landscape #3 is a 14 minutes and 37 second video shot in 2021 while traveling through Karachi, Peshawar, Rawalpindi, and Lahore, Pakistan. Mast seamlessly edits together hundreds of long static shots into one slow panning landscape. [Overview Courtesy of Brackett Creek Exhibitions]
tagline: A single tracking shot, remarkably dense with urban tableaux.
title: Landscape #3
